name: Autumn Eladrin
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Enchanting Presence
traits.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours. Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The eladrin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell sace DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: calm emotions, sleep * 3/day each: cure wounds (as a 5th-level spell), lesser restoration * 1/day each: greater restoration, heal, raise dead

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
